title: Which is the best site for bank exam simplification problem? - Quora

response.answer_text: I didn’t get your question, exactly. Do you want to solve problems based on simplification topic in the best manner or you want the webites which simplifies maths problems. If you are looking for questions to solve, online mock tests are available like oliveboard, practicemock, etc. For shortcuts on vedic maths and other topics, I would recommend a YouTube channel named STUDY SMART. Best shortcuts are explained in this channel. All the best.
